title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Internet Redux - Best gateways
description: A list of beat-by-beat and categorical starting points for journalists, including NICAR Net Tour, IRE Beat Source Guide, Power Reporting, Reference Page, and FreeSearching, among others.
